description:
LibreOffice 24.2.4 office suite is now available for download with 72 bug fixes for the latest LibreOffice 24.2 series. All users are recommended to update as soon as possible.

The post LibreOffice 24.2.4 Office Suite Is Now Available for Download with 72 Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: LibreOffice 24.2.4 Office Suite Is Now Available for Download with 72 Bug Fixes

description:
VLC 3.0.21 open-source media player is now available for download with a new AMD VQ Enhancer filter, Super Resolution scaling with AMD GPUs, and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post VLC 3.0.21 Adds New AMD VQ Enhancer Filter, Improves Opus Ambisonic Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: VLC 3.0.21 Adds New AMD VQ Enhancer Filter, Improves Opus Ambisonic Support

description:
blendOS 4 immutable, atomic, and declarative distribution is now available for download based on Arch Linux. Here's what's new!

The post Immutable Distro blendOS 4 Officially Released, Now Fully Declarative appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Immutable Distro blendOS 4 Officially Released, Now Fully Declarative
